name: Quick Bull Rush

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 13, Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: On your turn, you can perform a single bull rush combat maneuver in place of one of your melee attacks. You must choose the melee attack with the highest base attack bonus to make the bull rush.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: A bull rush combat maneuver is a standard action.
sections.name: Normal

description: You can barrel into your opponent and follow this with an attack.
